text: Noel Paul Stookey (born December 30, 1937) is an American singer-songwriter. Stookey is known by his stage name, Paul, in the folk trio Peter, Paul and Mary. He has been known by his first name, Noel, throughout his life. He continues to work as a singer and an activist, performing as a solo artist, and occasionally performing with Peter Yarrow. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Peter, Paul and Mary official website Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American folk singers Category:American folk musicians Category:American guitarists Category:American political activists Category:Singers from Baltimore Category:Musicians from Baltimore
title: Paul Stookey
